reviewText: an gang in blue was truly truly  great an I will continue to purchase from amazon anytime.
This movie was really good.  What a story line.

Gang is Blue is quite relevant to current events.  This is sad, but true.  It is well produced and can serve as a teaching document for law enforcement officials.  I would recommend for ages 18 and older for teaching or recreational viewing.
a good police corruption movie. most of these kind of movies are real life but it's on screen for our enjoyment. I think most police jobs are corrupt anyway. the title speaks for itself.
I like this movie it ws really good clear picture and color story line great if you like cop movies please purchase you will not be disappointed

A movie that shows an extreme exaggeration of police brutality.  This does not happen and there is no place for people to insinuate that it does.  It would be plastered all over the daily news if it were.  You have to know there are all sorts of reporters drooling for news items such as these.  So to review this as anything but a calamity of extremes is not doing it justice.
The acting is okay and the movie is okay as well.  I enjoyed it some.  But don't try to sell it as anything but a fictional movie please. Fair movie.
Saw this movie years ago and was soooo glad to have found it and buy it. Thanks for the price, also.

Being born in Chicago i am fascinated by City life, and we all know certain
areas of the city there is a high crime rate, and we wonder what our men in blue
are doing to make our city a more safe place, how they face and react in capturing these criminals that we all fear, This movie answeres our curiosity on how they
catch and treat these criminals, and Mario Van peebles is A plus in this movie along with the other actors as well, deffinatly a must have for all city folks.
A perfect resulotion of your curiosity on what urban city people have to face every day and what the gang in blue are doing about it.
There is the side of law enforcement that is presented to the public, and the side that most people don't see.
